title: Private Eye Dol
synopsis: Concurrent with an ADV game by HuneX/NEC-HE, the title is a pun about its detective and idol protagonist. It was released on issues 1 to 3 of NEC's Anime Freak FX, a CD-ROM magazine resembling a game for the PC-FX platform.
staff: [['Ishida, Atsuko', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Kinoshita, Yuuki', ['Assistant Animation Director']]]
